document_data.mainbody:
Rallio deVore was a tiefling in the Monastery of the Precipice in 1479 DR.
Rallio entered into an infernal pact but regretting the decision he went to Spellgard in search of Lady Saharels counsel in 1478 DR. Quickly, however, Rallio despaired of ever seeing the Lady and became depressed, starting to spend most of his time drinking.
